articles.title: Two Gigantic New Dinosaurs Discovered in China - IGN SOUTH AFRICA
articles.description: One species is estimated to have been more than 20 meters long.
articles.content:
A new study has confirmed the discovery of two new species of dinosaurs in northwest China, which scientists say are some of the first vertebrates uncovered in the region.

articles.title: South Africa’s vaccine headache switches from supply to demand - BusinessTech
articles.description: South Africa’s biggest challenge to meeting a target of vaccinating two-thirds of the adult population against Covid-19 has shifted from a shortage of supply to a lack of demand.
